#labels Featured
=自定义配置说明=

conn.asp 文件内容大致如下。
{{{
<%
domain="www.yourname.com"
ngcore="http://youtaba.tk/laobubu/ng/lib/vs.php"
copyright="<!--Website Virutalization-->"
%>

<%
Public Function SourceReplace(ByVal restxt) 
  For K = 1 To 10
    restxt=replace (restxt,"i"&k&".ytimg.com",domain&"/i"&k)
  Next
  restxt=replace (restxt,"i.ytimg.com",domain&"/i")
  restxt=replace (restxt,"s.ytimg.com",domain&"/s")
  restxt=replace (restxt,"www.youtube.com",domain)
  restxt=replace (restxt,"upload.youtube.com",domain&"/upload")
  restxt=replace (restxt,"youtube.com",domain)
  restxt=replace (restxt,"http://"&domain&"/s/yt/img/pixel-vfl73.gif","http://"&domain&"/pixel.gif")
  restxt=replace (restxt,"http:\/\/fq.u1.fyzzz.com/s\/yt\/img\/pixel-vfl73.gif","\/pixel.gif")
  restxt=replace (restxt,"http://"&domain&"/s/yt/img/icn_loading_animated-vfl24663.gif","http://"&domain&"/icn_loading_animated.gif")
  SourceReplace=restxt
End Function
Public Function WriteDownloadLink(ByVal strUrl)
  insert="<form method='Get' action='"+ngcore+"'>"
  insert=insert+"<input type='hidden' name='id' value='"+strUrl+"'>"
  insert=insert+"<input type='radio' name='q' value='5' checked /> FLV 320×240 <input type='radio' name='q' value='22'/> MP4 1280×720 [HD]"
  insert=insert+"<div><input class=' yt-uix-button yt-uix-tooltip' type='submit' value='Download Video (ID:"+strUrl+")'/></div></form><br>"
  WriteDownloadLink=insert
End Function
%>
}}}

可以自定义的区域为

{{{
<%
domain="www.yourname.com"
ngcore="http://youtaba.tk/laobubu/ng/lib/vs.php"
copyright="<!--Website Virutalization-->"
%>
}}}

其中 domain 为站点域名。可以为2级或1级域名，尽量不要带“/”；

ngcore 为你管系统地址，你管系统可以到[http://code.google.com/p/youtubeindex/]下载

*请不要使用默认的youtaba.tk地址，请及时更换以免发生灾难性后果*

copyright 为附加信息，可以加入版权信息。
